mapper.sql: Id, parentId, InvestOrderCode, TermNum, TermDate, RepayDate, TermAmount, PrincipalAmountSum, AccruedInterestSum, RemainInterestSum, RemainPriAmount, RepaidInterestSum, RepaidAmountSum, TermStatus, TransCode, PayStatus, CreditCode, Remark, memberid
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from yieldsum
order by ${orderByClause}

parentId = #{parentid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
